levels.description: Immediately locks onto the Operator with the highest Max HP value within attack range (excluding herself). While skill is active, only this Operator can be the primary target of Papyrus's healing. Attack Interval <@ba.vup>reduces</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, bounces per heal <@ba.vup>+{attack@chain.extra_value}</>
